attributes.action: Refund vaccinated people who were quarantined.
attributes.additional_details: Because the government put a flight ban on all flights from Southern Africa thereby making it impossible for people to bit the deadline of the 28th November.
attributes.background: I want UK government to Refund vaccinated people who were put in government quarantine following Omicron variant outbreak.

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Refund UK citizens and residents required to hotel quarantine from November 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603746
